title: Finding a Type Gauge
content: Can anybody help me find a shop that supplies type gauges in the UK? Preferably one with online ordering. I've exhausted every search I can think of in Google and can't find a source anywhere. The best I could find was a PDF but it only has Pica measurements and I sure could do with something that has Points as well.
author: pickles

comments.content:
You might want to ring the Typo department at Reading Uni - they should be able to pass on contact deatails for their supplier if they still have one.   
   
Cheers, Si

[http://www.londongraphics.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821204857/http:/www.londongraphics.co.uk/)   
On page 102 of their catalogue they have a selection of depth gauges and typescales, it is unavailable at the moment, but give them a call.   
Tim
